Face Shape Traits.measurements: Nearly equal face width and height, cheekbone width ≈ face length, gently angled jaw
Longer than wide (face length > cheekbone width), broad/rounded forehead, slightly pointed jaw
Elongated, face length is greatest dimension, similar width for forehead, cheekbones, and jaw
Tapered shape, broad forehead, narrow jaw, cheekbone width > forehead width, jaw much narrower
Face Shape Traits.personality: High intellect, creativity, sensitivity, possibly anxiety-prone (Nervous-Mercury type)

Face Shape Traits.measurements: Variant of Triangular: wide temples/forehead/cheekbones, slender/pointed chin, softer upper face
Face Shape Traits.personality: Creativity, charisma, loving, sometimes dramatic nature (Sanguine-Venus type)

Face Shape Traits.measurements: Forehead, cheekbones, jawline approximately equal width, well-defined/angular jaw, short and broad appearance
Longer square face: angular features, roughly equal forehead and cheekbone width, face is longer vertically
Face Shape Traits.personality: Dynamic, ambitious, action-oriented (Sanguine-Mars or Pluto variant)

Face Shape Traits.measurements: Narrow forehead and jaw, widest at the cheekbones, high/prominent cheekbones, narrow/pointed chin
Wide forehead and smaller jaw (tapers down), lines slant inward from broad forehead to narrower jaw
Narrow forehead and broad/strong jaw (inverts the trapezoid), lower face wider than the forehead
Face Shape Traits.personality: Grounded, dependable, oriented toward practical/material needs (Lymphatic-Jupiter type)

Face Shape Traits.measurements: Facial width proportionally larger relative to length (low facial index)
Face Shape Traits.personality: Strong physical presence, pragmatic, outgoing nature

Face Shape Traits.measurements: Facial width small relative to length (high facial index), long and slender appearance
Face Shape Traits.personality: Refinement, focus, introverted or analytical nature

Forehead Traits.personality: Logical, structured mind, decisive nature (earth type)
Creativity, intuitive, social, imaginative ('feminine' thinking style)
Intelligence, long-term planning ability, strong influence from father's side
Quick thinking, pragmatism, strong influence from mother's side, active/action-oriented
Openness in thinking, big-picture outlook ('Jupiterian' expansive mind)
Focus, specialization, cautious thinking ('Saturnian' reserved intellect)
Strong imaginative faculties, creative mental energy
Very direct, factual thinker ('masculine' trait, denoting practicality)
Quick wit, decisiveness, but also impatience

Forehead Traits.characteristics: Uneven contour, wavy hairline or bumpy skull shape
Noticeably raised bony ridges above the eyes
Forehead Traits.personality: Strong, assertive character with directness (often more pronounced in males)

Forehead Traits.characteristics: Flat area above eyes with little bony projection
A pad of flesh at the glabella (between eyebrows)
Forehead Traits.personality: Driven, self-focused nature, personal ambition or stubbornness

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: High, semi-circular arches, smooth curve
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Expressive, friendly, open approach, creativity, optimism

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Sharply angled or 'broken' shape, pointed arch
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Dynamic, action-oriented personality, leadership tendencies

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Little to no arch, horizontal shape
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Logical, straightforward thinker, practical, grounded

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Curve upward toward the center (inverted ' ' shape)
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Analytical depth, skepticism, worry, overthinks

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Outer tail is higher than inner part, upward slope
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Ambitious, optimistic, steadily pursues goals, alertness, confidence

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Outer tail droops lower than inner part
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Sensitivity, compassion, cautious nature, gentle, empathetic

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Placed farther above the eyes, large gap
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Patience, restraint, reflective nature, observes before acting

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Sit closer to the eyes, small gap
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Direct, bold, impulsive, reacts quickly, asserts readily

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Little space between inner ends
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Intense focus, single-mindedness, sometimes impatience

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Eyebrows grow together with no gap
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Very intense, driven personality with deep thought, stubbornness, secretiveness, endurance

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Large space between the brows
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Open-minded, tolerant, many simultaneous interests, broad perspective, may struggle with concentration

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Extending beyond the outer corner of the eye (long tails)
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Strong social connections, endurance, can handle stress, maintain long-term friendships

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Do not extend far beyond the eye
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Independence, focus on a few close relationships, lower stress tolerance, may get overwhelmed easily

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: A visible gap or break in an eyebrow
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Significant life interruption, changes direction unexpectedly

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: The two eyebrows differ in shape or height
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Dual nature: presents differently in public vs private life, imbalance between logic and emotion

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Broad, full hair growth throughout the brow
Eyebrow Traits.personality: High energy, confidence, strong will, assertive, passionate, straightforward nature

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Fine or sparse eyebrow hair, light appearance
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Sensitivity, precision, delicate approach, cautious, detail-oriented, sometimes less assertive

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Very thick, untamed brows with hairs often curling or merging
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Bold, rebellious character, abundant life-force, quick temper or impatience when overgrown

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Brow hairs at the inner end (near the nose) grow straight upward or orderly
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Principled, organized in thoughts, possibly stubborn in beliefs

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Brow hairs, especially at the start, are messy or dispersed
Eyebrow Traits.personality: May have had a chaotic early life or is searching for direction, creativity but difficulty in focus

Eyebrow Traits.characteristics: Appear to change with expressions/lighting (medium thickness, no strong defining shape)
Eyebrow Traits.personality: Adaptability, versatile, unpredictable nature

Eye Traits.characteristics: Large, widely opened, big irises, often almond-shaped, sclera shows on 2-3 sides, horizontal/slightly down-tilted inner corners
Eye Traits.personality: Kindness, receptivity, peaceable, creative soul

Eye Traits.characteristics: Somewhat triangular, upper eyelid's highest point is at the middle (slight peak), sclera visible on three sides
Eye Traits.personality: Balanced mix of focus and calm, often patient but firm in views

Eye Traits.characteristics: Generally large, set horizontally, both inner and outer corners pointing slightly down, gentle curve to upper lid (wide arc)
Eye Traits.personality: Patience, reliability, but also potential sadness or resignation

Eye Traits.characteristics: More downward-tilted, outer/inner corners drop noticeably, pronounced upper lid curve
Eye Traits.personality: Great endurance and empathy but prone to melancholy or heavy-heartedness

Eye Traits.characteristics: Oblique shape, inner corner tilted down and outer corner up, medium-sized but piercing, often reddish/intense whites
Eye Traits.personality: Keen perception, intensity, dominance, intimidating gaze

Eye Traits.characteristics: Very wide open, round-looking, relatively narrow compared to face width, narrow/pinched corners
Eye Traits.personality: Alertness, curiosity, wisdom, watchful, cautious approach

Eye Traits.characteristics: Inner corner extends downward (hook-like), whole eye slants upward toward outer corner, descending curve near inner third
Eye Traits.personality: Proud or dramatic look, vanity, showmanship, love of attention

Eye Traits.characteristics: More up-tilted, elongated version of peacock eyes, sharply angled upward at outer corner, narrower overall
Eye Traits.personality: Even stronger pride and ambition, highly driven, seeking achievement and recognition

Eye Traits.characteristics: Drooping in the outer half of the upper eyelid (forming a fold), inner half unaffected/curving upward
Eye Traits.personality: Carries burdens or fatigue, hardworking, enduring, may struggle with delegation

Eye Traits.characteristics: Rectangular or 'elongated almond' eyes, fierce, typically wider set, framed by strong brows, focused look
Eye Traits.personality: Courage, competitive drive, charisma, penetrating and confident

Eye Traits.characteristics: Majestic, somewhat heavy-lidded, large, set under strong brow bones, proud gaze
Eye Traits.personality: Leadership, generosity, power, confident, commands respect, can be imposing

Eye Traits.characteristics: Tilt upward on the outer corners, often dramatic almond shape
Eye Traits.personality: Playfulness, intuition, seductive charm, clever, adaptable, mysterious side

Eye Traits.characteristics: Sly, elongated, slight upward slant, often thinner shape
Eye Traits.personality: Cunning, witty, strategic, resourceful, observant, prefers subtle approaches

Eye Traits.characteristics: Very large, roundish, show a lot of white (sclera), gentle expression
Eye Traits.personality: Depth of emotion, empathy, sensitivity, wears heart on sleeve, nurturing

Eye Traits.characteristics: Warm, smiling eyes that curve a bit upward, often sparkle, medium-large, friendly vibe
Eye Traits.personality: Social, intelligent, balances playfulness with harmony-seeking, excellent communicators

Eye Traits.characteristics: Form a crescent shape when smiling, lower part of iris hidden, lids curve like a half-moon
Eye Traits.personality: Genuine warmth, optimism, friendliness, laughs easily, connects readily

Eye Traits.characteristics: Thin and curved, similar to a new moon shape (often when smiling)
Eye Traits.personality: Gentle, contented personality, prefers peace, avoids conflict

Eye Traits.characteristics: Noticeable space between the eyes ($b>a$ or distance between eyes > eye width)
Eye Traits.personality: Open-minded, broad outlook, handles change well, sees the 'big picture', may struggle with detail focus

Eye Traits.characteristics: Little space between the eyes ($b<a$ or interocular distance < eye width)
Eye Traits.personality: Detail-oriented, concentrated approach, focused, attentive, may be perceived as intense or overly cautious

Eye Traits.characteristics: Positioned deeply in the sockets, upper eyelid crease not visible
Eye Traits.personality: Reflective, observant, reserved, strong analytical skills, calm demeanor

Eye Traits.characteristics: Deeply set eyes but with some upper eyelid showing
Eye Traits.personality: Introspection combined with approachability, depth in thinking but engages openly

Eye Traits.characteristics: Appear to protrude outward (prominent eye globes)
Eye Traits.personality: Expressive, spontaneous nature, open with feelings, quick to react, enthusiastic, though sometimes anxious

Eye Traits.characteristics: White of the eye showing above the iris
Eye Traits.personality: High drive or tension, very ambitious but prone to stress or insomnia

Eye Traits.characteristics: White showing under the iris
Eye Traits.personality: Sympathetic, precautious nature, sometimes linked to health issues or giving more than receiving

Eye Traits.characteristics: White can be seen both above and below the iris (very rare naturally)
Eye Traits.personality: Extreme stress, highly eccentric, ungrounded personality, imbalance, anxious

Eye Traits.characteristics: Relatively small irises, a lot of white around
Eye Traits.personality: Critical, attentive to detail, possibly high-strung

Eye Traits.characteristics: Very large irises (or dark eyes where whites are less visible)
Eye Traits.personality: Compassionate, open heart, trusts easily, perceived as kind or naive

Eye Traits.characteristics: Unusually large pupil size (not due to lighting)
Eye Traits.personality: Enthusiastic nature, openness to new experiences, at times lack of control over impulses

Eye Traits.characteristics: Very small pupils (in normal light)
Eye Traits.personality: Caution, scrutiny, tension, very analytical, reserved, experiencing stress/pain

Eye Traits.characteristics: Little marks or indented dots on the iris (often lower part)
Eye Traits.personality: Intuitive or psychic tendencies, senses things before they happen

Eye Traits.characteristics: Puffy or baggy lower eyelids
Eye Traits.personality: Overworking or carrying emotional burdens, kindness and worry, 'carrying the weight of others' concerns'

Eye Traits.characteristics: Brief or sparse lashes
Eye Traits.personality: Straightforward, no-frills, perhaps less concerned with flirting or superficial allure

Eye Traits.characteristics: Lush, long lashes
Eye Traits.personality: Expressive, in touch with emotions, creative, able to draw others in ('magnetic' personality)

Eye Traits.characteristics: Upper lids that droop, covering part of the iris
Eye Traits.personality: Calm, patient personality, love of comfort, sometimes artistic or philosophical, physical tiredness or sensuality

Eye Traits.characteristics: Upper eyelids droop across the entire eye width
Eye Traits.personality: World-weary or very relaxed, reserved nature, doesn't easily get excited

Eye Traits.characteristics: Upper lids sag primarily on the outer side
Eye Traits.personality: Kind-hearted, empathetic individual, faced challenges but remains gentle

Eye Traits.characteristics: The lower lid forms a straight horizontal line
Eye Traits.personality: Emotional control, manages feelings carefully, presents a steadfast demeanor

Eye Traits.characteristics: Noticeable upward curve (smiley) or downward curve (sad)
Eye Traits.personality: Upward: warmth, optimism; Downward: empathy and concern

Eye Traits.characteristics: Excess skin or structure on the upper lid covers the crease completely ('hooded' look)
Eye Traits.personality: Deep thinkers, cautious, love of privacy or strategy

Eye Traits.characteristics: Clear, visible eyelid fold ('double eyelid')
Eye Traits.personality: Balanced trait, expresses emotion openly, sociability, emotional balance

Eye Traits.characteristics: A partial crease is visible (in-between hooded and fully visible)
Eye Traits.personality: Can be both private and open as needed, adaptable in emotional expression

Nose Traits.characteristics: Thick, meaty nasal bridge with more soft tissue, less defined profile
Nose Traits.personality: Down-to-earth, indulgent nature, enjoys life's comforts, sometimes linked to generosity

Nose Traits.characteristics: Perfectly straight dorsum from root to tip, no bumps or curves in profile
Nose Traits.personality: Rational, disciplined, unobtrusive (classical beauty and balance)

Nose Traits.characteristics: Mostly straight nose with a slight bump or elevation at the nasal root
Nose Traits.personality: Strong character, ambition, leadership, love of challenge

Nose Traits.characteristics: Prominent bone hump on the mid-bridge creating a bent or 'hook' shape
Nose Traits.personality: Analytical, strategic mind, resilience, independent, stubborn, keen insight ('eagle' quality)

Nose Traits.characteristics: Long bridge that ends in a very broad base and large nostrils (distinctive African nose type)
Nose Traits.personality: Curiosity, openness, creativity, charismatic, optimistic, approachable

Nose Traits.characteristics: Pronounced curvature on the bridge (dorsum curves outward)
Nose Traits.personality: Strong convictions, endurance, faces obstacles head-on, serious demeanor

Nose Traits.characteristics: An irregular bridge with one or more small protrusions or depressions
Nose Traits.personality: Complex character, varied life experiences, adaptable

Nose Traits.characteristics: A twisted or off-center bridge shape, slanted when viewed from the front
Nose Traits.personality: Nonconformist, doesn't follow the beaten path, unconventional approach

Nose Traits.characteristics: Nose bridge visibly veers toward the right side of the face
Nose Traits.personality: Indicates issues or unique traits in one's outward/professional life or with father figures (right side relates to public life/male influence)

Nose Traits.characteristics: Bridge veers toward the left side of the face
Nose Traits.personality: Implies personal life complexities or a strong maternal/feminine impact on character (left side relates to private life/female influence)

Nose Traits.characteristics: A broad, bulbous nasal tip (often with wide alar base)
Nose Traits.personality: Generosity, wealth attraction, practicality, straightforward personality, 'nothing to hide'

Nose Traits.characteristics: A thin or pinched tip
Nose Traits.personality: Precision, calculating nature, detail-focused, less impulsive with money/emotions, sometimes reserved or frugal

Nose Traits.characteristics: A rounded, protruding tip (often slightly downturned)
Nose Traits.personality: Hearty, sociable spirit, optimism, indulgence, enjoys life's pleasures, usually friendly

Nose Traits.characteristics: A tip with a visible dent or line down the center (double-lobed appearance)
Nose Traits.personality: Multi-faceted personality, pulled in two directions when making decisions, generous, caring, but sometimes indecisive or self-contradictory

Nose Traits.characteristics: Tip tilts upward, exposing the nostrils when viewed from the front
Nose Traits.personality: Optimistic, friendly, quick-to-act nature, a bit impulsive or nosey

Nose Traits.characteristics: Tip points downward (sometimes called a 'droopy' nose)
Nose Traits.personality: More serious, conservative personality, hardworking, cautious, resilient, can imply slyness (in negative excess or if only the tip droops)

Nose Traits.characteristics: Broad nostril openings (alae spread out)
Nose Traits.personality: Generosity, strong life energy, tends to spend money freely, outgoing, risk-tolerant, very wide can mean money flows out easily (spendthrift)

Nose Traits.characteristics: Small, tight nostril openings
Nose Traits.personality: More cautious approach to resources, lower physical stamina, careful with money/energy, introverted or guarded

Nose Traits.characteristics: Substantial nostril wings (thick sides of the nose)
Nose Traits.personality: Strong will, robustness, can handle pressure, determined, linked to stubbornness

Nose Traits.characteristics: Thin, delicate nostril wings
Nose Traits.personality: Sensitivity, refined taste, easily affected by environment, gentler approach, less physical robustness but more finesse

Nose Traits.characteristics: You can see into the nostrils from the front (they flare upward)
Nose Traits.personality: Openness, straightforwardness, 'doesn't hide anything', however, can mean wealth or energy tends to dissipate

Nose Traits.characteristics: Nostrils are not visible from the front (point downward or are covered by tip)
Nose Traits.personality: Caution, privacy, discreet, good at saving money/energy, modest or reserved by nature

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Plump, filled-out cheeks with convex fullness
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Vitality, generosity of spirit, cheerful, good-natured, physically hearty, strong vital energy and kindness

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Sunken cheeks that curve inward (often under prominent cheekbones)
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Driven or has endured hardships, independent, disciplined, sometimes emotionally guarded

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Lower part of cheeks (jaw area) protrudes or is very fleshy
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Strong will, sometimes stubbornness, solid sense of authority, imposing

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Covered with ample flesh, not visibly bony
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Approachability, warmth, ambition softened by compassion, achieves goals through networking and charm

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Prominent, protruding zygomatic bones with less fat covering, stand out sharply
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Pronounced ambition, courage, authority, bold, takes charge, strong pride, sometimes domineering or impatient

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Not prominent and sit relatively flat on the face
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Modest, cooperative personality, does not seek spotlight or authority, works diligently behind the scenes, values harmony

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Positioned high (near the eye level), often visibly sloping down to mouth corners
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Leadership potential, influence, ambition, courage to assert oneself, likes to be in control, earns respect easily

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Set lower on the face (closer to nose level)
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Cooperative, supportive nature, team player, values security and relationships, dependable 'right-hand' person

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Project more to the front (nearer to the nose) than to the sides, giving a narrower look
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Earnest, intense personality, approaches life head-on, very direct, involved in detailed work or research

Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.characteristics: Spread wide toward the ears (lateral prominence), giving width to the face
Cheek and Cheekbone Traits.personality: Engages broadly with the world, sociable, multi-tasking, authoritative in groups, carries ambition on the 'side' (delegates and networks)

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: Upper and lower lips are thick and well-rounded
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Loving, giving nature, strong desires for affection and sensual pleasures, generous in relationships, values emotional connection

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: Upper and lower lips are slender with little volume
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Pragmatic, reserved nature, very self-reliant, not overly demonstrative, prefers clear communication, can be critical or precise in speech

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: Neither notably full nor very thin, well-defined borders (ideal or neutral)
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Balance in giving and receiving love, emotionally stable, communicates well, healthy self-esteem, enjoys social interactions but values independence

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: Mouth is narrow in width, but the center of both lips is plump (natural pout)
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: A bit self-focused or enjoys being cared for, charming, sometimes coquettish, draws others in to assist or pamper

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: When closed, the line between them is straight horizontal
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Even-keeled, keeps emotions in check, reliable, steady, 'what you see is what you get'

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: The meeting line of the closed lips forms a gentle wave or Cupid's bow shape
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Expressiveness, artistic, playful, good sense of humor, eloquent or poetic speech

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: The corners of the mouth naturally point downwards (even at rest)
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Pessimistic or serious outlook, skeptical or critical, doesn't easily get excited, but often very compassionate

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: The mouth corners lift upward slightly, as if smiling subtly
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Optimistic, positive disposition, cheerful, approachable, sees possibilities, recovers from setbacks quickly

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: Lips stick out slightly (subtle pout), often with a narrower mouth and forward-thrust center
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Stubbornness, strong drive for self-gratification, demanding, 'my way' attitude, playful/flirtatious side
Rich imagination, idealism in love, tends to give more emotionally, can be emotionally high-strung or expect partners to intuit needs
Pragmatic approach to relationships, seeks tangible benefits and pleasure, persevering in getting what they want, a bit self-indulgent or demanding of affection

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: Lower lip pushes forward beyond the upper (in profile)
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Hard to satisfy, often stubborn in opinions, won't back down, might hold grudges

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: Upper lip protrudes beyond the lower (in profile)
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Patience, restraint, holds back immediate gratification, endures hardship quietly, refined manners, careful with words

Mouth and Lip Traits.characteristics: Both lips, and the mouth as a whole, project forward on the face ('overbite' look or very fleshy, forward lips)
Mouth and Lip Traits.personality: Deeply enjoys sensory pleasures (gourmet food, affection, luxuries), lives richly in the moment, seeks enjoyment, sometimes struggles with moderation

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: A tall philtrum (distance from nose base to upper lip is large)
Philtrum Traits.personality: Strong vitality and sexual energy, active, driven life force, long life potential, perseverance, physically active

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: A very short distance between nose and upper lip
Philtrum Traits.personality: Impatience, love of instant results, impulsive, enjoys immediate pleasures, youthful/child-like charm, might rush decisions
Abundant innate energy and life force, strong vitality, creativity, good fertility and passion, recovers quickly from illness/setbacks, robust constitution
Lower reserves of stamina, low energy reserves, needs more rest, manages energy carefully, carefree or dissipative approach to life's resources

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: The groove is broad or the ridges are far apart
Philtrum Traits.personality: Very outgoing, charismatic nature, breadth of life (many children or projects), generous, big 'life capacity'

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: A slim philtrum with ridges close together
Philtrum Traits.personality: Selectivity, focuses energy into a few channels (fewer children/projects, but dedicated), more introverted or narrowly specialized life

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: Wider at bottom (near lips) and narrower at top
Philtrum Traits.personality: Early life energy constrained, later life expands, blooms later in life, gains influence or wealth as they age

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: Wider at the top (nose end) and narrower at the lip line
Philtrum Traits.personality: Strong start in life (good inheritance or early opportunities), narrows down later, channels ancestral/parental strengths into a specific focused goal

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: Parallel sides, uniform width from top to bottom (like a column)
Philtrum Traits.personality: Steadiness and balance in life, consistent energy, straightforward life paths, combines parental influences evenly, stability

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: Looks diamond-shaped (broad in middle, tapering at both ends)
Philtrum Traits.personality: Mix of traits, creativity, adaptability, may reinvent self at mid-life, versatile, multi-talented, unorthodox path

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: The philtrum groove is essentially absent (upper lip area is flat)
Philtrum Traits.personality: Lacks strong familial support or keeps life purpose hidden, difficulty in expressing love openly

Philtrum Traits.characteristics: Any irregularity in philtrum shape (crooked, one ridge higher, scarred, etc.)
Philtrum Traits.personality: Unusual life journey or a challenge affecting the core vitality, resilience (scar might represent a specific trauma)

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: A chin that curves gently with no sharp angles
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Agreeable, adaptable nature, prefers compromise over conflict, likable and diplomatic

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: A chin that comes to a distinct point (seen in heart/triangle face)
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Strong personal will and imagination, creative or 'nervous temperament' individuals, determined, sensitive to criticism, insists on independence

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: A broad, flat-ended chin, often with a flat underside (profile)
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Firmness of character, courage, sometimes obstinacy, 'fighter' or survivor personality, stands their ground

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: Chin juts forward beyond the plane of the face (profile shows it sticking out)
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Strong willpower, assertiveness, leadership qualities, won't easily concede in arguments, pushes forward to achieve aims

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: Chin that slopes back toward the neck ('weak chin')
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: More yielding, accommodating nature, avoids confrontation, tends to be a follower, kind and agreeable, might struggle with asserting themselves or endurance

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: Well-defined, broad jaw angles that are clearly visible, creates a 'frame'
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Physical strength and a strong character, decisive, courageous, can be blunt, prominent in leaders or people who don't back down easily

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: A jaw that's narrow or has soft definition (cheeks flow into neck without a clear corner)
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Gentle, flexible personality, prefers harmony, avoids hard competition, relies more on intellect or charm, bends rather than breaks in adversity

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: Jawbone extends broad, giving width to the lower face (often seen in square face types)
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Practical strength, endurance, sometimes stubbornness, very grounded, handles stress well, can work hard physically, protective, family-oriented streak

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: Tapered jawline that's much slimmer than the cheekbone width (common in V or heart shapes)
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Refinement, strategy, adaptability, relies on wit and negotiation, appears less intimidating, occasionally less physical robustness but more intellectual approach

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: Gentle/rounded vs. sharp/angular gonial angle (90° or less)
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Blunt: cooperative and tolerant character, easygoing; Sharp: more aggressive, resolute nature, highly driven, uncompromising

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: One side of the jaw is different (stronger or higher) than the other
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Imbalance between public and private persona, stronger right side (authoritative at work) vs. stronger left side (assertive at home)

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: A fleshy fold under the chin, visible when the head is upright
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Enjoyment of comforts, slower/more reflective approach, generosity and indulgence, loves good food/relaxation, tendency to hold onto things (weight, grudges)

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: The jaw as a whole sits further back relative to the upper face (profile: chin/jaw set behind the lips)
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Might defer to others rather than lead, excellent people skills, polite, good listeners, may struggle to assert their own needs

Chin and Jawline Traits.characteristics: A forward-thrusting jaw (either upper or lower)
Chin and Jawline Traits.personality: Lower jaw protrudes (underbite): very strong-willed, rebellious; Upper jaw (overbite) is extreme: very eager, could indicate impatience or biting off more than they can chew

Ear Traits.characteristics: Top is above the level of the eyebrows and/or above the nose tip line
Ear Traits.personality: Quick to learn, quick to act, assumes leadership early, willing to take risks, sets standards high, can be impatient

Ear Traits.characteristics: Top is below the eyebrow level or bottom is below the nose line
Ear Traits.personality: More methodical, slower-to-react, prefers to observe and fully understand before acting, considerate, good at following through, may achieve later

Ear Traits.characteristics: Aligned right between the brow and nose reference lines (balanced position)
Ear Traits.personality: Even-keeled personality, balances risk and caution well, moderate, stable character with steady progress

Ear Traits.characteristics: One ear set higher than the other (asymmetry)
Ear Traits.personality: Mixed influences, processes information differently in work vs home life, imbalance in logical vs emotional side, adaptability

Ear Traits.characteristics: Rest close to the skull with little gap (no protruding)
Ear Traits.personality: More conservative, cautious individual, respects rules and norms, reserved demeanor, doesn't like drawing attention

Ear Traits.characteristics: Ears that stick out noticeably from the head
Ear Traits.personality: Independence, free-thinking, non-conformists, creative and bold, might be a bit self-conscious, doesn't readily take advice

Ear Traits.characteristics: The ear angle is such that the top tilts toward the back of the head (posterior rotation >15°)
Ear Traits.personality: Good listener and cautious, takes time to process input, usually polite, tendency to live in the past or have traditional values

Ear Traits.characteristics: Ears rotated so the top tilts forward (as if cupping forward)
Ear Traits.personality: Eager to grasp new ideas, a bit impulsive, innovative and future-oriented, might be poor listeners

Ear Traits.characteristics: Ears that are straight up, with the long axis vertical (not tilted much either way)
Ear Traits.personality: Balance in approach and adaptability, adjusts to new info but respects old info, well-adjusted way of handling tasks

Ear Traits.characteristics: Proportionally small or positioned such that they don't extend far outwards (snug to head)
Ear Traits.personality: Introverted or self-contained nature, observant and careful with social energy, skilled in focused tasks and loyalty

Ear Traits.characteristics: Placed a bit outward or larger relative to face width
Ear Traits.personality: Extroversion and curiosity, likes to extend into their environment, social, easily distracted (picking up too many signals), generally open-minded and friendly

Ear Traits.characteristics: Appear big relative to head (one facial length can fit into the face < 5 times)
Ear Traits.personality: Intelligence (especially practical and musical), good memory and wisdom, good at absorbing information, might take big risks, outspoken and self-confident

Ear Traits.characteristics: Neither large nor small (roughly the length of the nose - ideal proportion)
Ear Traits.personality: Well-balanced character, mix of caution and boldness, average appetite for risk, gets along with most people and adapts well

Ear Traits.characteristics: Noticeably small ears compared to face
Ear Traits.personality: Detail-oriented, cautious personality, sensitive, refined tastes, attention to detail, may not enjoy loud environments or big crowds

Ear Traits.characteristics: One ear is larger than the other to the naked eye
Ear Traits.personality: Inner conflict between logic and emotion, the larger ear may indicate which side (logic/right ear or emotion/left ear) dominates
